articles.title: Khawaja: Australia 'should be playing Afghanistan' - ESPNcricinfo
articles.description: The Australia opener acknowledged the complex issues involved but said CA's stance was 'a little bit hypocritical'
articles.content: NewsThe Australia opener acknowledged the complex issues involved but said CA's stance was 'a little bit hypocritical'

articles.title: "For Australia, it is about...": Khawaja's advises teammates ahead of must-win T20 WC clash against India - Hindustan Times
articles.description: India and Australia take on each other in a must-win clash at Saint Lucia on Monday. India is at the top of Group One with two wins in two games and have four points. They won their previous game against Bangladesh by 50 runs. On the other hand, Australia is …
articles.content: Melbourne [Australia], : Ahead of his side's ICC T20 World Cup Super Eights clash against India, Australia opener Usman Khawaja urged his team to move on from the shock defeat to Afghanistan and focu… [+3880 chars]
